disallowupload.title: Disable File Upload
disallowupload.description: Set all file upload fields to disalbled.

disallowiframes.title: Disable Iframes
disallowiframes.description: Do not load content in iframes.

screensaverwarningtime.title: Screensaver Warning Time
screensaverwarningtime.description: The length of time to show the screensaver warning prior to activating the screensaver. Set to 0 to disable the warning. (seconds)

screensaverwarningmessage.title: Screensaver Warning Message
screensaverwarningmessage.description: The message to display prior to activating the screensaver

screensaverreloadinterval.title: Screensaver Reload Interval
screensaverreloadinterval.description: How often to refresh the screensaver content while it is active. (minutes)

clearcookiesreset.title: Clear Cookies on Reset
clearcookiesreset.description: Should we clear cookies on reset?

remoteschedule.title: Use Remote Schedule
remoteschedule.description: Should we use a remote schedule?

remotescheduleurl.title: Remote Schedule URL
remotescheduleurl.description: The URL of the JSON formatted schedule.

schedulepollinterval.title: Remote Schedule Poll Interval
schedulepollinterval.description: How often to check for an updated schedule.

servelocaldirectory.title: Serve Local: Directory
servelocaldirectory.description: The directory to serve content from

servelocalhost.title: Serve Local: Host
servelocalhost.description: The host to serve local content on

servelocalport.title: Serve Local: Port
servelocalport.description: The port to serve local content on

url.title: Content URL(s)
url.description: URL must start with http:// or https://

tokenserver.title: Token Server URL
tokenserver.description: URL to fetch additional tokens from as JSON.

customtoken.title: Custom Token JSON
customtoken.description: Stringified JSON object including additional tokens.

whitelist.title: Content Domain Whitelist
whitelist.description: When specified, will only allow content on these domains.

multipleurlmode.title: Multiple URL Mode

useragent.title: User Agent
useragent.description: Customize the user agent sent with content and screensaver requests.

authorization.title: Authorization Header
authorization.description: Customize the authorization header sent with content and screensaver requests.
